DOC.brief_summary: Randomized controlled trial test efficacy text message intervention low income , low health literacy group Latino patient . Project Dulce 2.0 ( PD 2.0 ) address barrier participation health education class , increase adherence treatment medication improve diabetes self management behavior skill . Two community clinic organization provide service large proportion Latino patient type 2 diabetes participate randomize 200 patient one 2 arm : standard diabetes management care ( control ) text message standard care . Comparisons group evaluate clinical , behavioral psychosocial outcome . Intervention : Standard Care Text Messaging . All participant receive standard diabetes care provide primary care provider clinic . Of 100 randomized intervention arm give instruction text message component address throughout duration study .
DOC.criteria: Ages 1875 , Type 2 DM , Enrolled community health center , Latino ethnicity , non Project Dulce participant , HbA1c > /= 8 % , must able read Have severe illness preclude frequent visit clinic , severe medical condition , poor mental function reason expect patient difficulty comply requirement study , history malignancy , except subject diseasefree > 10 year , whose malignancy basal squamous cell skin carcinoma , patient creatinine level great 3.5 , history drug alcohol abuse within 12 month prior study , permanent resident area . Patients willing use cell phone texting capability .
